oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nitrogen leaching in organic and conventional farming in a 8-year field study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lemola, R.
Esala, M.
Turtola, E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nitrogen leaching from farming systems with different N inputs was studied on a fine sand soil in Toholampi, Central Ostrobothnia.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lemola, R.; Esala, M. and Turtola, E. (2009) Nitrogen leaching in organic and conventional farming in a 8-year field study. In: Programme, abstracts, list of participants, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 5 (2), NJF Report, p. 43.
